text: A rift claimed with a Rift Sigil. [[col:magic]]This rift can be used by the Ecstatic Legions to send a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero to another rift owned by them.[[/col]]

A rift claimed with a Rift Sigil. [[col:magic]]This rift can be used by the Fecundites to send a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero to another rift owned by them.[[/col]]
A dormant rift left behind after Ursun's roar. This rift can be used for teleportation once claimed using a Rift Sigil.

A rift claimed with a Rift Sigil. [[col:magic]]This rift can be used by the Legion of the Gorequeen to send a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero to another rift owned by them.[[/col]]

A rift claimed with a Rift Sigil. [[col:magic]]This rift can be used by the Puppets of Misrule to send a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero to another rift owned by them.[[/col]]
A rift providing passage to the Altar of Battle in Zanbaijin.

This underground Sea Lane can be entered by any [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero for direct travel between the [[col:magic]]River Ruin[[/col]] and the [[col:magic]]Frozen Sea[[/col]].{{tr:sea_lane_travel_node_tooltip}}

This Dawi-Zharr Tunnel can be entered by any [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero for direct travel between [[col:magic]]The Dark Lands[[/col]] and [[col:magic]]Cathay[[/col]]. Use it to reach [[col:yellow]]Zharr-Naggrund[[/col]] and halt the Chaos Dwarf invasion!

This Dawi-Zharr Tunnel can be entered by any [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero for direct travel between [[col:magic]]The Dark Lands[[/col]] and [[col:magic]]The Old World[[/col]]. Use it to reach [[col:yellow]]Zharr-Naggrund[[/col]] and halt the Chaos Dwarf invasion!

This Dawi-Zharr Tunnel can be entered by any [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero for direct travel between [[col:magic]]The Dark Lands[[/col]] and [[col:magic]]Lustria[[/col]]. Use it to reach [[col:yellow]]Zharr-Naggrund[[/col]] and halt the Chaos Dwarf invasion!

This Dawi-Zharr Tunnel can be entered by any [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero for direct travel between [[col:magic]]The Dark Lands[[/col]] and [[col:magic]]Naggaroth[[/col]]. Use it to reach [[col:yellow]]Zharr-Naggrund[[/col]] and halt the Chaos Dwarf invasion!

This Dawi-Zharr Tunnel can be entered by any [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero for direct travel between [[col:magic]]The Dark Lands[[/col]] and [[col:magic]]The Southlands[[/col]]. Use it to reach [[col:yellow]]Zharr-Naggrund[[/col]] and halt the Chaos Dwarf invasion!

A rift providing passage for the Changeling's faction. [[col:magic]]This rift can only be entered by a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero belonging to the Changeling and cannot be closed.[[/col]]

A rift providing passage for Be'lakor's faction. [[col:magic]]This rift can only be entered by a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero belonging to Be'lakor and cannot be closed.[[/col]]
A rift providing passage towards the Forge of Souls. [[col:magic]]This rift can only be entered by a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord and cannot be closed.[[/col]]

This Sea Lane can be entered by any [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero for direct travel between the [[col:magic]]Jade Sea[[/col]] and the [[col:magic]]Sea of Dread[[/col]].{{tr:sea_lane_travel_node_tooltip}}

A rift providing passage to the Realms of Chaos. [[col:magic]]Rifts can be entered by a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Legendary Lord and closed by any [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord or [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero.[[/col]]
